content: - 13 -     References    Adrian, Tobias, and Hyun-Song. Shin (2010). “The Changing Nature of Financial   Intermediation and the Financial Crisis of 2007-09,” Staff Reports Working Paper  No. 439.  New York:  Federal Reserve Bank of New York, April,  www.newyorkfed.org/research/staff_reports/sr439.pdf      Ajello, Andrea, Thomas Laubach, David López-Salido, and Taisuke Nakata (2015).    “Financial Stability and Optimal Interest-Rate Policy,” working paper.   Washington:  Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System, February,  www.frbsf.org/economic-research/files/1A-Ajello-Laubach-Lopez_Salido- Nakata.pdf.     Bhutta, Neil, Jack Popper, and Daniel R. Ringo (forthcoming).  “The 2014 Home   Mortgage Disclosure Act Data,” Federal Reserve Bulletin.    Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System, Department of Housing and Urban   Development, Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation, Federal Housing Finance  Agency, Office of the Comptroller of the Currency, and Securities and Exchange  Commission (2014).  “Six Federal Agencies Jointly Approve Final Risk Retention  Rule,” press release, October 22,  www.federalreserve.gov/newsevents/press/bcreg/20141022a.htm.     Cecchetti, Stephen G., and Enisse Kharroubi (2012).  “Reassessing the Impact of Finance   on Growth,” BIS Working Papers 381.  Basel, Switzerland:  Bank for  International Settlements, July, www.bis.org/publ/work381.pdf.     Claessens, Stijn (2014).  “An Overview of Macroprudential Policy Tools,” IMF Working   Paper WP/14/214.  Washington:  International Monetary Fund, December,  www.imf.org/external/pubs/ft/wp/2014/wp14214.pdf.     Commodity Futures Trading Commission (2012).  “Registration of Swap Dealers and   Major Swap Participants,” final rules, Federal Register, vol. 77 (January 19),  pp. 2613-29,  www.cftc.gov/idc/groups/public/@lrfederalregister/documents/file/2012- 792a.pdf.     Dudley, William C. (2015).  “Regulation and Liquidity Provision,” speech delivered at   the SIFMA Liquidity Forum, New York, September 30,  www.newyorkfed.org/newsevents/speeches/2015/dud150930.html     Financial Stability Board (2013).  Strengthening Oversight and Regulation of Shadow   Banking:  Policy Framework for Strengthening Oversight and Regulation of  Shadow Banking Entities.  Basel, Switzerland:  FSB, August,  www.financialstabilityboard.org/publications/r_130829c.pdf.
